# Documentation: td_llm_indexer.sh

- **Size**: 398 bytes
- **Lines**: 21
- **Extension**: .sh
- **Type**: Regular file

## Original Source

```sh
#!/bin/bash

set -euxo pipefail

# Download requirements
cd llm-target-determinator
pip install -q -r requirements.txt
cd ../codellama
pip install --no-build-isolation -v -e .
pip install numpy==1.26.0

# Run indexer
cd ../llm-target-determinator

torchrun \
    --standalone \
    --nnodes=1 \
    --nproc-per-node=1 \
    indexer.py \
    --experiment-name indexer-files \
    --granularity FILE

```
